Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. #1 -- Prop. #1 - $735,000 Bond - BOC - 15 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 1
(BONDS)

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO ISSUE $735,000 OF 15-YEAR GENERAL OBLIGATION BONDS OF WASHINGTON PARISH FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT NO. 1 FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING AND IMPROVING BUILDINGS, MACHINERY AND EQUIPMENT, INCLUDING BOTH REAL AND PERSONAL PROPERTY, TO BE USED IN GIVING FIRE PROTECTION TO THE PROPERTY IN SAID DISTRICT, SAID BONDS TO BE PAYABLE FROM AD VALOREM TAXES.
Race.FullText: Shall Washington Parish Fire Protection District No. 1, State of Louisiana (the "District"), incur debt and issue bonds to the amount of Seven Hundred Thirty-Five Thousand Dollars ($735,000) to run fifteen (15) years from the date thereof, with interest at a rate or rates not exceeding eight per centum (8%) per annum, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing and improving buildings, machinery and equipment, including both real and personal property, title to which shall be in the public, to be used in giving fire protection to the property in the District, which bonds will be general obligations of the District and will be payable from ad valorem taxes to be levied and collected in the manner provided by Article VI, Section 33 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, and statutory authority supplemental thereto?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. #1 -- Prop. #2 - 8.46 Mill - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 2
(MILLAGE RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 8.46 MILL PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND/OR OPERATING FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES AND EQUIPMENT IN AND FOR FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT NO. 1, INCLUDING THE COST OF OBTAINING WATER FOR FIRE PROTECTION PURPOSES.
Race.FullText: Shall Washington Parish Fire Protection District No. 1, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of eight and forty-six hundredths (8.46) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District, including the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. #1 -- Prop. #3 - 5 Mill - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 3
(MILLAGE RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 5 MILL PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND/OR
OPERATING FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES AND EQUIPMENT IN AND FOR FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT NO. 1, INCLUDING THE COST OF OBTAINING WATER FOR FIRE PROTECTION PURPOSES.
Race.FullText: Shall Washington Parish Fire Protection District No. 1, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of five (5) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District, including the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
